Body:
"""
        Test that the right error is raised when the salt is not provided for
        PBKDF2-based key derivation.
        """
engine = crypto.CryptographyEngine()
args = enums.DerivationMethod.PBKDF2, 16
kwargs = {'hash_algorithm': enums.HashingAlgorithm.SHA_256}
self.assertRaisesRegex(exceptions.InvalidField,
    'For PBKDF2 key derivation, salt must be specified.', engine.derive_key,
    *args, **kwargs)
